actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that proceeds from identical wagers shall not be aggregated for purposes of determining whether a tax should be withheld.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that proceeds from identical wagers shall not be aggregated for purposes of determining the withholding of tax on certain gambling winnings.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that proceeds from identical wagers shall not be aggregated for purposes of determining whether a tax should be withheld.
